name: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns Bundle
summary:
Level-up your Mortal Kombat 1 Base Game Experience and finish the fight through Havik's Reign of Khaos.
This bundle contains the Khaos Reigns Expansion and Kombat Pack.

The Khaos Reigns Expansion includes the Khaos Reigns Story Expansion and 6 new fighters with Noob Saibot, Cyrax and Sektor available at launch while the guest fighters Ghostface (Scream Franchise), T-1000 (Terminator 2) and Conan the Barbarian will be available post=launch with a 1 week early access period.

The Kombat Pack includes the fighters Omni-Man (Invincible), Quan Chi, Peacemaker (DC’s Peacemaker), Ermac, Homelander (The Boys) and Takeda Takahashi along with the Kameo fighters Tremor, Khameleon, Janet Cage, Mavado and Ferra.
The Kombat Pack also adds the Jean-Claude Van Damme Skin for Johnny Cage.
